
### stack canaries implementation  {.smaller}


* ‘‘StackGuard’’ --- 1998 paper proposing strategy
* GCC: command-line options 

   * <code>-fstack-protector</code>
   * <code>-fstack-protector-strong</code>
   * <code>-fstack-protector-all</code>
   * one of these often default
   * three differ in how many functions are ‘protected’

* Microsoft C/C++ compiler: <code>/GS</code>  

   * on by default
